name: Void Rush
description:
Void Rush is a bullet hell game made as a demo for my game development course. It uses the UBF system for bullet logic, which can be found here: https://github.com/kvfrans/Unlimited-Bullet-Festiv.... I would also like to thank MillionthVector for use of his free sprites. His website can be found here: http://millionthvector.blogspot.com. Also thanks to Cole Spears for his amazing music.

Controls are: WASD to move, Escape to quit.
